pens.comedy_function: The straight man. Deadpan reactions to chaos. The audience laughs because Pens doesn't.
pens.dialogue_style: Minimal. 1-5 words max per line. Never explains himself. Uses ellipses frequently.
pens.visual_notes: Short, round black and white body, small flipper-wings, maroon crest on head. Diet soda always visible.
pens.design_reference: Pen Pen from Neon Genesis Evangelion

relationships.reows: Tolerates his chaos with quiet amusement. The odd couple.
relationships.oinks: Quiet comfortable friendship. Can sit in silence together.
relationships.quacks: Listens to theories without judgment. Neither agrees nor disagrees.
relationships.chubs: Respects the hustle. Occasionally gives surprisingly sharp business advice.

chubs.comedy_function: Monetizes everything. Sees business opportunities in the most inappropriate situations.
catchphrases: I see a market opportunity here.
chubs.dialogue_style: Business jargon in casual contexts. Speaks in pitches. Medium-length lines.
chubs.visual_notes: Large, round, blob-like seal body. Widest silhouette. Small tie. Briefcase when walking.

relationships.reows: Torn between friendship and financial sense when Reows pitches ideas.
relationships.meows: Mutual respect. Both take themselves seriously.
relationships.oinks: Frequent customer. Has suggested 'optimizing the menu' multiple times.
relationships.pens: Pens occasionally drops surprisingly good business advice.
relationships.quacks: Gets nervous when Quacks investigates his 'business dealings.'

meows.comedy_function: Overly formal in casual situations. Treats simple interactions like diplomatic negotiations.
meows.signature_prop: monocle or top hat (TBD based on pixel art testing)
catchphrases: On behalf of the United Meows of Ameowica...
I shall consult with my embassy.
This is a matter of international importance.
meows.dialogue_style: Formal, diplomatic language. Long sentences with unnecessary gravitas.
meows.visual_notes: Upright cat, sleek posture. Monocle or top hat for diplomacy flair.

relationships.reows: Finds him fascinating and horrifying in equal measure.
relationships.oinks: Treats ordering at the diner like a state dinner.
relationships.quacks: Quacks suspects him of being a spy. Meows is oblivious.

oinks.comedy_function: The everyman. Pig running a diner. Gets pulled into everyone's schemes.
catchphrases: Can I just get someone to order something?
Welcome to the diner, what can I—
oinks.dialogue_style: Normal, relatable speech. Exasperated reactions. The only character who talks like a regular person.
oinks.visual_notes: Medium-round pig body with apron. Often holding a plate or towel.
oinks.design_reference: Friendly cartoon pig with diner worker accessories
oinks.role_in_world: Owns and operates the Main Street diner — the central gathering place.

relationships.everyone: Everyone comes to Oinks. He's the social hub.
relationships.quacks: Gets interrogated about mundane diner things regularly.
relationships.meows: Takes way too long to order.

quacks.comedy_function: Conspiracy theorist plot engine. Investigates mundane things. Connects dots that aren't there.
catchphrases: That's EXACTLY what they want you to think.
I've been tracking this for weeks.
quacks.dialogue_style: Intense, conspiratorial whisper energy. Uses 'they' and 'them' without referencing anyone specific.
quacks.visual_notes: Small, compact call duck. Smallest silhouette. Magnifying glass or notebook.

relationships.reows: Wild ideas accidentally validate theories. Dangerous pairing.
relationships.meows: Suspects Meows is a foreign agent.
relationships.pens: Tries to recruit Pens for investigations. Pens declines.

reows.comedy_function: Chaos agent. Bursts into scenes with wild energy and half-baked ideas delivered with total confidence.
reows.signature_prop: white collar and blue pork pie hat with white center (Yogi Bear style)
catchphrases: GUYS. I just had the GREATEST idea.
reows.dialogue_style: High energy, exclamation points, ALL CAPS for emphasis. Long enthusiastic rants.
reows.visual_notes: Large bear. White collar around neck, blue pork pie hat with white center. Brown fur with lighter brown patches on belly, face, and inner ears. Biggest silhouette. Always in motion.
reows.design_reference: Yogi Bear (Hanna-Barbera) visual. Top Cat meets Kramer personality.
reows.name_note: 'Reow' is a cat sound. Reows is a bear. This is INTENTIONAL. Do not change.

relationships.pens: The classic odd couple. Chaos meets calm. Highest comedy potential.
relationships.chubs: Pitches terrible business ideas with total confidence.
relationships.quacks: Wild ideas accidentally validate conspiracy theories.
relationships.oinks: Tries to 'help' at the diner. Makes everything worse.
relationships.meows: Fascinates and horrifies the diplomat in equal measure.
